CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property (Article 1 para. 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Deprivation of property;General principles of international law)
JUDGES: Marko Bošnjak;Vincent A. De Gaetano;Georges Ravarani
TEXT: 4. The applicant was born in 1974 and lives in Vác.

5. The applicant was employed at a State-owned company from 1 January 2010 until 19 February 2013. Part of his severance payment was taxed at a 98% rate in the amount of 19,349,120 Hungarian forints (HUF) (approximately 64,500 euros (EUR)).
